verses.text: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Nabuchodonosor, Nabuchodonosor \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* terrified, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* together \w the|strong="H0559"\w* diviners \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wise \w men|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*: \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* saw \w a|strong="H3045"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* being \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* saw.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* answered \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Syriac: O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* thy \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* we \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w declare|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* answering \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*: \w The|strong="H3046"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w is|strong="H2493"\w* gone \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* my mind: unless \w you|strong="H2006"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* meaning thereof, \w you|strong="H2006"\w* shall be put \w to|strong="H0560"\w* death, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* your \w houses|strong="H1005"\w* shall be confiscated.

But \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H2006"\w* tell \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* meaning \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*, \w you|strong="H2006"\w* shall \w receive|strong="H6902"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w*, \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w*, \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w great|strong="H7690"\w* honour: therefore tell \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

They \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* again \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: Let \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* we \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w declare|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* it.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* seek \w to|strong="H0560"\w* gain \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w since|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* gone \w from|strong="H4481"\w* me.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* therefore \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w one|strong="H2298"\w* sentence concerning \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* have also framed \w a|strong="H2298"\w* lying \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* full \w of|strong="H6925"\w* deceit, \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w speak|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* till \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w* pass away. \w Tell|strong="H0560"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* therefore \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* may \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* also give \w a|strong="H2298"\w* true \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Chaldeains \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w There|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H3007"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w can|strong="H1768"\w* accomplish thy \w word|strong="H4406"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* doth \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w though|strong="H6903"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* mighty, ask \w such|strong="H1836"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* diviner, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* wise \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w Chaldean|strong="H3779"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou askest, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w difficult|strong="H3358"\w*; \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w can|strong="H1768"\w* any \w one|strong="H0321"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* found \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w can|strong="H1768"\w* shew \w it|strong="H1321"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w except|strong="H3861"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* conversation \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* men.

Upon hearing \w this|strong="H1836"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* fury, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w great|strong="H7690"\w* wrath, \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* be put \w to|strong="H0560"\w* death.

\w And|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H6992"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* being \w gone|strong="H5312"\w* \w forth|strong="H5312"\w*, \w the|strong="H6992"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* were \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*: \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w his|strong="H1156"\w* companions were sought \w for|strong="H1156"\w*, \w to|strong="H1156"\w* be put \w to|strong="H1156"\w* death.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* inquired \w concerning|strong="H2942"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* law \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* sentence, \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* general \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* army, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w gone|strong="H5312"\w* \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w kill|strong="H6992"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w asked|strong="H0560"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* received \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w why|strong="H4101"\w* \w so|strong="H0116"\w* cruel \w a|strong="H0116"\w* sentence \w was|strong="H1841"\w* gone forth \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* face \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*. \w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w told|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*,

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* desired \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w him|strong="H5415"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* resolve \w the|strong="H1768"\w* question \w and|strong="H4430"\w* declare it \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w he|strong="H0116"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* into \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* told \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w* \w to|strong="H2269"\w* Ananias, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* Misael, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* Azarias \w his|strong="H3046"\w* companions:

\w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* end \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* should ask mercy \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* face \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* secret, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* companions might \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w perish|strong="H0007"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w mystery|strong="H7328"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1541"\w* \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w by|strong="H2376"\w* \w a|strong="H0116"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*: \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*,

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* speaking \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Lord \w from|strong="H4481"\w* eternity \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* evermore: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* fortitude \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1932"\w* changeth \w times|strong="H2166"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* ages: taketh \w away|strong="H5709"\w* kingdoms \w and|strong="H4430"\w* establisheth them, giveth \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* them \w that|strong="H3046"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0999"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1932"\w* revealeth \w deep|strong="H5994"\w* \w and|strong="H1541"\w* hidden things, \w and|strong="H1541"\w* knoweth \w what|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1932"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2816"\w*: \w and|strong="H1541"\w* light \w is|strong="H1932"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* him.

\w To|strong="H1156"\w* thee, O \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* our \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w give|strong="H3029"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3029"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* thee: \w because|strong="H4481"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* strength: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* thou hast shewn \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* desired \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thee, \w for|strong="H1768"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* us, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* discourse.

After \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w given|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0007"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*: \w Destroy|strong="H0007"\w* not \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: \w bring|strong="H5954"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* solution \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w haste|strong="H0927"\w* \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*: \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w a|strong="H7912"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Juda, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* resolve \w the|strong="H0116"\w* question \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* Baltassar: Thinkest thou indeed \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou canst \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof?

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* made answer \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w The|strong="H1768"\w* secret \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* desireth \w to|strong="H0560"\w* know, none \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w*, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* philosophers, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w diviners|strong="H1505"\w*, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* soothsayers \w can|strong="H1768"\w* \w declare|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* \w there|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* revealeth \w mysteries|strong="H7328"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* hath shewn \w to|strong="H5922"\w* thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Nabuchodonosor, \w what|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* come \w to|strong="H5922"\w* pass \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w latter|strong="H0320"\w* times. Thy \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w head|strong="H7217"\w* upon thy \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w*:
